name: FirstBaptistConnect
0:
”Alexa, open first baptist connect”
”Alexa, ask first baptist connect for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start first baptist connect”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: first baptist connect
des: Hear the latest messages from the First Baptist Church of Minneola podcast. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to our podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next".
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
